p: As of February 29, 2020, of 188 patients actively followed up one week after discharge, 31 (16.5%) reported mild discomfort and none reported fever. Mild discomfort included cough ( n = 19), chest tightness ( n = 4), shortness of breath ( n = 5), night sweats ( n = 5), and gastrointestinal discomfort ( n = 3). Of 112 patients who attended follow-up two weeks post-discharge, there were no reported fevers, but 6 (5.4%) complained of cough and chest tightness. No patients required hospitalization at follow-up.
